name: DeviantArt - V5 Style Profile Page
description: Give Profile Pages a V5 Look. Compatible with "Eclipse Exp+".  Not Compatible with "V7 Style Profile Page"

user.name: Zigaudrey
user.about: A person who creates CSS style because there are things I don't agree.

additional_info:
Work with all Theme and while Log Out
Remove Comment section under Post and Watch Button 
Compatible with "Eclipse Exp+"
Not Compatible with "V7 Style Profile Page"

UPDATE:
-Removed Light Background for Widgets like Custom Box, Comments, Deviation Spotlight
-Comment Boxes are now relooked to be like V5's
-Added Texts Color in Widget, now it is readeable with all theme
-Fixed Code for Legacy Journal and added color for Interest Text, even for Log Out
